pages.text: $(li)The Gauntlet of Guard is the second strongest melee weapon, after the $(l:patchouli:weapons/infernal_forge)Infernal Forge$(/l).$(br)$(li)Right clicking while you have this weapon in your hand you can attract nearby creatures to you.

pages.name: Gauntlet Of Guard
pages.text: The Gauntlet of Guard can only be obtained defeating the $(l:patchouli:weapons/blood_sprayer)Ender Guardian$(/l).
